lead_paragraph: World Cup-winning prop Charlie Faumuina has confirmed he will leave New Zealand rugby next year and join French side Toulouse after the British and Irish Lions series against the All Blacks.

headline.print_headline: All Blacks Prop Faumuina to Play in France Next Year
headline.main: All Blacks Prop Faumuina to Play in France Next Year

snippet: World Cup-winning prop Charlie Faumuina has confirmed he will leave New Zealand rugby next year and join French side Toulouse after the British and Irish Lions series against the All Blacks....
